The Department of MBA was established in the year 2006 with an annual intake of 60 students.

The department is headed by Dr. J. Pardha Saradhi is having 14 years of experience in Research and Teaching.There are 3 Professor,2 Associate Professor, 10 Assistant professors in the department. All the faculty members are well experienced in their areas of specialization and delivering quality-services to the best of their ability. The faculty of the department help students in preparation of mini-project reports (ARA & SIP), Power Point Presentations, delivering seminars and Main Project at the end of their programme.

The department offers soft-skills, case-studies, group discussions, expert Professional-Guest & Technical Lectures and Industrial Tours & Visits in addition to their curriculum which in-turn provide, rich professional experience which will be helpful in their professional career and stimulate simulative behavior in their employment career. Seperate PDP lab(Personality Development Lab) have been made to enrich both academic and managerial skills of the students

In the face of present global recession especially in the IT sector resulting in crippling career opportunities since September 2008, a vulnerable necessity as arisen to all the graduates and post graduates in technical education to develop knowledge, skills and ability in the field of management to outshine in the changing global environment. Further, the management course has its stand at the helm as any position in the career finally culminates in administration of management. Hence, no specific mention is needed for acquiring additional academic distinction by the technocrats for highly successful career. In view of the recession trends across the globe, IT & CSE and other software professional invariably pursuing MBA as extension of their career may result as strong competitive arena to other non engineering students pursuing the same field as their career. Hence non-engineering management students have to strengthen their skills both academic & managerial, to spinout of cutthroat & stringent competition posed by surrounds in their employment career.
Providing excellence in education to build a better tomorrow, through a realistic and research oriented environment.

• To offer high quality Masters in Business Administration and to prepare students for professional career.
  • To contribute towards societal development through imparting quality education.
